meta.content: Kenesaw Public School is a welcoming pre-school through 12th grade facility that focuses on providing excellent education for all in a community-oriented environment.

April 1, 2020
Of the four confirmed COVID-19 cases in Adams County, three of the cases were determined to be spread by community transmission. Investigators were not able to determine the source of the exposure in these three instances. As a result, the

div.p: Kindergarten Roundup will be Thursday, May 7th @ 7:00pm via zoom. Please visit the Kenesaw Website to download, print, and complete the Kindergarten Roundup paperwork. Kindergarten packets can be picked up starting Monday, May 4th. Paperwork [...]
